title: Ask Steve, Kentucky Derby, Sheryl Underwood, Miss Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Ask Steve, Kentucky Derby, Sheryl Underwood, Miss Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
It's Thursday and Steve is feeling like a playa!  There is no question that is off limits in Ask Steve today.  Bushwick Bill of Geto Boys announced that he has stage 4 pancreatic cancer.  Did Attorney General William Barr lie to Congress or nah?  The Kentucky Derby is on Saturday and Steve is attending.  Sheryl Underwood stops by to talk about John Singleton, Bill Cosby and more.  Today in Closing Remarks, we get reminded of our thank you list for God and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
